item.title: The Math Behind the Magic: Vector Space Models in Java
item.description: A deep dive into Cosine Similarity, TF-IDF, and how I built a ranking engine without Lucene.

item.title: From O(N) to O(1): Building a Java Search Engine from Scratch
item.description: How I built a Positional Inverted Index and TF-IDF ranker without using Lucene or Elasticsearch.
